Hi all,
Thanks fo=
r your efforts in attempting to answer my question. 

I'll try and be more =
clear:

The task I've been given is meant to introduce me to Junit testing.=
 
So 
I started simply by writing a few methods that produce a single hard =

coded Fortune Cookie. That was easy to test. 

The next step was to produc=
e a random cookie. This is where it gets 
tricky. I've written a basic meth=
od that returns a random fortune 
cookie quote (see below).

String[] fortu=
neCookieQuote =3D new String[] 
{"fortune cookie quote 1",
"fortune cookie =
quote 2",
"fortune cookie quote 3",
"fortune cookie quote 4"};

	public Str=
ing getFortuneCookieQuote(){
		Random r =3D new Random();
		return fortuneC=
ookieQuote[r.nextInt(4)];	
		
	}

As you can all see it is a simple program=
 to create. The question is

ybody knows of any good
